Package it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Actions are messages generated by the client to communicate to the server.
    ActionFactory
    Class used to create the correct action in response to a given operation
    ActionHandler
    This class is the only one capable of performing an action.
    BuildGameAction
    action used to perform a build operation
    ConfirmGameAction
    Used by classes God when the user has to answer a question that changes the flow of the player's turn
    GameAction
    Actions are messages generated by the client to make a change to the model, such as moving a worker or building a block.
    IndexTileGameAction
    Many action are just the choice of a tile, therefore all these actions extend this abstract class
    LobbySizeAction
    This is an setup action used when a user has to choose the size of the new lobby to which it will be added.
    MoveGameAction
    action used to perform a move operation
    PlaceWorkerActions
    action used to place workers on the board during game setup
    PoseidonBuildGameAction
    action used to perform a build operation when the player owns Poseidon
    RemoveBlock
    action used when player uses power of Ares, that removes a block on the selected tile
    SelectGodTurnAction
    action used during game setup when players are choosing their god
    SelectNicknameAction
    action used before the game starts to let users select their nickname
    SelectOpponentWorkerGameAction
    action used when player uses Charon power
    SelectWorkerGameAction
    action used to let players choose their worker for the current turn
    SetupActionHandler
